reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My only complaints about this apartment were the shower drainage system(kept on flooding no matter how much they tried to fix it) and the fact that the entrance to the apartment was directly into the children's room(no hallway). Combined with the fact that I've seen no security guard around, made me feel a bit unsafe, but nothing wrong happened.

reviews.text: I just stayed one night and boy was I glad it was only one night. For starters, I paid right at $100 for one night. To me, that should buy me a pretty decent place in Thailand - at a price of $30/night, I would have said the place was nice -- but not $100.
reviews.title: Landscaping is pretty...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room decor was straight out of the 1970s and looked like it hadn't been updated since then. The drapes were just as dated. The lampshade had multiple torn places in it. There were bugs in the room. There was neither a shower curtain nor toiletries to go with the shower. The a/c barely worked (tonight, I have just a fan on and trust me when I saw I'm far cooler tonight), and the hot water didn't get warmer than lukewarm -- and it didn't get to lukewarm until I was done with my 5 minute shower.
reviews.title: Great place with genuinely caring, willing and flexible staff and a fabulous restaurant menu

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would have said the staff was great -- and they were almost to the end of my stay. Check in was easy and friendly. The breakfast staff was easy/friendly (the breakfast, by the way, includes eggs/toast/fruit/juice but it really doesn't taste good -- I'd eat somewhere else). And check out was easy/friendly -- I just wish it had been on my own terms. Check out was 11 am. At 10:30, I was "reminded" (by a visit to my room) that check out was 11. I said I understood. The woman hovered, clearly willing me to grab my bag and get moving. So that's what I did. By 10:40, they had me packed in a cab and on my way out of there. I didn't need a reminder -- I would have preferred to have stayed in my room until 10:55 and then checked out. It wasn't a huge deal, but it just left a bad taste in my mouth.
reviews.title: Highly recommend - fabulous, beautiful, quiet mid-range resort, no need to go anywhere else

reviews.text: I will say the beach location seems to be good - the weather didn't cooperate during my stay there, so I can't say whether that would have been good or not.
